name: Get Rolled!
description:
Get Rolled! is a Turn-Based Strategy game with a main baking mechanic. Roll the dice, play your cards, and beat the bosses!

There are 3 main bosses that must be defeated, mold, burnt bread, and the bread knife. 

To bake, you need 3 main ingridients, yeast, flour, and salt. Each of these ingridients are used to perform an action, as well as create the base recipie for a bread roll. Enhance your rolls with the 3 special ingridients, egg, cinnamonn, and garlic.

Combine cards to form other cards, and build strategy around your luck!

Made with Love <3
